column4: does anyone have any ideas what to try after I've installed realplayer 10, and it doens't work?  It just sits there after I type realplay and does nothing
the whole point of using ubuntu on this PC is so it is more user-friendly, so realplayer needs to work :)
does anyone have any ideas on what to try with realplayer?  I've installed it, when i try to run it, it does absolutely nothing
try mplayer instead
what if I need to play realvideo content?
then get realplayer libs?
ok i will try that
you should get all the libs you want though
and recompile it yourself
I want them all!
you don't need them all ;-)
well I want it to play all realaudio stuff
ok, I have mplayer installed, but I can't find real codecs for it?  I do haev the multiverse thing turned on but I don't see them
where should I be lookign for these codecs?
./configure mplayer and see what codecs are listed as disabled
then google and build one
(or install from ubuntu archive)
I have searched the ubuntu archive, but i don't see them
then search google
I always build mplayer and libs myself - waay faster
./configure --prefix=$HOME/local
